meanings.definition: The position or role of a councillor.
meanings.sent1: In her councillorship, she helped make decisions for the town.
meanings.sent2: His councillorship involves attending meetings and representing the community.
meanings.sent3: The cat's councillorship in the household involves choosing the best napping spots.
meanings.sent4: Her councillorship shone brightly in the dark room of local politics.
meanings.sent5: The councillorship of the tree in the forest is to provide shade and shelter.

meanings.definition: The term of office of a councillor.
meanings.sent1: During his councillorship, many positive changes were made in the city.
meanings.sent2: The councillorship of the mayor lasted for four years.
meanings.sent3: The councillorship of the class pet ended when summer break began.
meanings.sent4: Her councillorship was marked by dedication and hard work.
meanings.sent5: The councillorship of the lighthouse keeper ensured safe passage for ships.
